text: District 4 is an electoral district in Malta. It was established in 1921. Its boundaries have changed many times but it currently consists of the localities of Il-Fgura, Il-Gudja, Paola, Santa Luċija and Ħal Tarxien. ==Representatives== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !Election !colspan=10|Representatives |- !1921 |rowspan=2; style="background-color: " | |rowspan=2|Carmelo Bugelli (UPM) |rowspan=1; style="background-color: " | |rowspan=1|Michael Dundon (Labour) |rowspan=3; style="background-color: " | |rowspan=1|Pier Giuseppe Frendo (Labour) |rowspan=4; style="background-color: " | |rowspan=4|Robert E.
